protein.specific_function: Oxidoreductase that catalyzes the NADP-dependent reduction of cytochrome c and one-electron acceptors, such as doxorubicin, potassium ferricyanide and menadione (in vitro)

reference.reference_text: Paine MJ, Garner AP, Powell D, Sibbald J, Sales M, Pratt N, Smith T, Tew DG, Wolf CR: Cloning and characterization of a novel human dual flavin reductase. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jan 14;275(2):1471-8.
